alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 8:25AM CST until February 27 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Piatt County in central Illinois... Northwestern Champaign County in east central Illinois... * Until 900 AM CST. * At 825 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Monticello, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... White Heath around 830 AM CST. Seymour around 835 AM CST. Savoy, Mahomet and Bondville around 840 AM CST. Champaign, Urbana and Lake Of The Woods around 845 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Thomasboro. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 231 and 246. Interstate 72 between mile markers 169 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 172 and 185. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
